name: JBR
tagline: Joomla 3 Bootstrap Responsive template workshop for Joomla Webdesigner Magazine
body:
This Joomla 3 template is created for a workshop in the Dutch Joomla Webdesigner Magazine 2015. The workshop explains how to use the possibilities of Joomla 3 in your template. It makes use of **Bootstrap** and the **'Joomla User Interface'** (JUI) Library. The result is a simple one page **responsive website** with less then 50 lines of custom CSS. In this repository you will find the code needed for each of the steps in the workshop.
